extendedInfo.description: This idea was copied by Microsoft for KidsCorner on Windows Phone 8 !!Protect your apps from kids and your friends, who might get access to your phone.Hive launcher allows you to hide and protect apps that you dont want others to use when you loan your phone to your friend. Change the profile before you share your phone, and others will not be able to use your facebook or email apps (you need to select the apps which will be visible on the user profile - one time effort).Used by the CIA, FBI and other agencies, for the first time, released on google app store.The most powerful and secure launcher on the market.Choose apps which will be displayed on each profile.Have different sets of widgets and apps on your desktop for each profile.You can set different ring tone, ring volume settings on each profile.Enable the pattern lock screen, and switch profiles using different lock patterns (currently configurable to 3).Use the Hive Lock screen, to launch apps in a swipe.The admin profile is password protected, when you are not using the pattern lock screen.Currently tested on samsung gs2 and samsung note.The dock apps are also configurable, just drag an app from the app list to the dock region.If there are any issues, please send a mail to bugs@dronasys.com, and we will fix them at the earliest.
